name: @build-stack/html
description: A modern Material Design 3 HTML components library built with Tailwind CSS

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets
scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p ./dist/theme && cp -r ./theme/* ./dist/theme/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r ./utils ./dist/utils && cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist
scripts.lint: echo 'No linting configured for HTML package'

author: Build Stack
